system.description: This spell withers a single plant or deals 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 15d6) to a plant creature. If used against a plant creature, the creature gets a Fortitude save for half damage. If used on a plant in an area (e.g. a tree), the plant dies. If used on a crop or similar, it destroys a 200-foot-square area.
system.target: One plant or one plant creature
